description: This PHP source file generates the web interface for managing static routing settings in a network device. It includes HTML markup, embedded PHP for dynamic content, JavaScript for client-side interaction, and server communication for adding, deleting, and toggling static routes.

methods.name: PHP include statements
methods.description: Includes header, user bar, navigation, and footer components for the web page.

methods.name: getInstanceIds()
methods.description: Retrieves IDs of IPv4 forwarding entries from device configuration.

methods.name: getStr()
methods.description: Fetches specific string values for each forwarding entry to determine static routes and their attributes.
